1.title: Starting a Time Machine Prop Model

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The H.G. Wells novel the Time Machine led to many different offshoots, including a movie. The model kit prop replica is discussed in this model building lesson.

2.title: Video Workbench Studio Tour

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Jason Gares of Video Workbench gives a "behind the scenes" tour of his studio.

3.title: Star Wars ARC-170 Starfighter Plastic Model Kit Review

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Jason and his step-son Hawk put together and review the Star Wars ARC-170 Starfighter plastic model kit produced by Revell.

4.title: Preparing to Paint a Time Machine Prop Model

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Work continues on the H.G. Wells Time Machine prop replica model kit. Get guidance on preparations, including washing and priming.

5.title: Studio Update: The HULK and Time Machines

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Jason Gares goes over where he's at with the three Time Machine prop replica model kits and the HULK vinyl kit he's working on.

6.title: Dragon Models HULK Vinyl Model Kit Review

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Jason Gares reviews the HULK Vinyl Model Kit by Dragon Models.

7.title: Completing the Time Machine Sub-assembly

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Up next in the Time Machine prop replica model kit build are the generator cones. Learn to apply decals, work with electronics, and finish detailing on the saddle.

8.title: Studio Update: Time Machine and Engineer Bust

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Jason discusses where's he's at with the three Time Machine builds, a Prometheus Engineer bust and the release of the Video Workbench classic title; How to Photograph Scale Models. He also shows how to airbrush paint onto flocking material.

9.title: Completing Time Machine Pads and Disc

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: It's time to check back on the Time Machine model kit. Get going with the assembly, align the saddle and generator housing, and construct the time disc.

10.title: Advanced Masking Tips

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Get ready to learn how to properly mask your next model kit project by following Jason Gares in this in-depth instructional video.

11.title: Studio Update: From Old to New Studio

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Jason talks about where he's at with both the Prometheus Engineer bust and the Time Machine builds. A new studio is also revealed.

12.title: Studio Update: New Studio Tour and Engineer Bust Painting

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Jason Gares shows off his new studio location and has an update on painting the Prometheus Engineer bust resin model kit.

13.title: Mars Attacks Statue Review

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Jason Gares does an out-of-box review of the Quarantine Studio Mars Attacks un-painted statue.

14.title: Studio Update: Mars Attacks Martian Invader Painting and Time Machine Saddles

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: In this studio update, Jason Gares discusses where he's at with painting the Mars Attacks Martian Invader statue and the Time Machine saddles.

15.title: Adding Time Machine Decals and Pinstripes

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: You are almost at the final stage of the Time Machine prop replica scale model build, which means it's time to work on details, including decals and pinstriping.

16.title: Iwata HP-BH Airbrush Troubleshooting

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Jason Gares tries to help a fellow Iwata airbrush user with a unique problem. Jason's solution is textbook and advised by Iwata.

17.title: Monstorpalooza Conventions

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Monstorpalooza and Son of Monstorpalooza are covered.

18.title: Mars Attacks Introduction

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Looking for a gory, otherworldly science fiction model project? Start right here with an overview and discussion of the Mars Attacks Martian Invader statue.

19.title: Mars Attacks Model Kit Painting Tips

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Now that the gaps have been filled and parts washed, it's time to add primer to the Martian Invader model. Here we learn to select and apply paints.

20.title: Mars Attacks Model Kit Detailing

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Airbrushing the Mars Attacks Martian Invader statue is no easy task, and starts by carefully masking the arms and legs. Complete the final detail painting here.

21.title: Dr. Zarkov's Rocket Ship Resin Model Kit Review

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Jason Gares reviews Starship Miniatures Dr. Zarkov's Rocket Ship resin model kit.

22.title: Chuck Davenport Interview - Part 1

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Video Workbench owner Jason Gares interviews Original Series host Chuck Davenport.

23.title: Chuck Davenport Interview - Part 2

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Chuck Davenport and Jason Gares continue their conversation.

24.title: BanDai Star Wars Stormtrooper Plastic Model Kit Review

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: Jason Gares reviews the BanDai Star Wars Stormtrooper plastic model kit.

25.title: Model Kit Mold Making and Casting Overview

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: As an experienced modeler, one step you can take to advance success in the hobby is to design and craft custom molds. Learn about different mold types here.

26.title: DeAgostini Star Wars Millennium Falcon Studio Scale Model Kit Unboxing & Review (Packs 1 to 4)

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: Jason Gares does an unboxing and review of packs 1 to 4 of the DeAgostini Star Wars Millennium Falcon studio scale model kit.

27.title: Silicone Mold Making with LEGOS

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

27.plot: What happens if you need more parts than you have to finish a custom model kit or diorama? Cast objects with LEGO building blocks and a two-part silicone mold.

28.title: Wild House Models Stasis Pod Resin Model Kit Review

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

28.plot: Jason Gares reviews Wild House Models stasis pod resin model kit.

31.title: How to Test Cast Model Parts

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

31.plot: In this final DIY episode, learn why test castings are essential before making any final, expensive castings to be sold as products.

1.title: The History of Scale Model Kits

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: As a scale model enthusiast, understanding the history of the hobby can add a new perspective on a fun activity. Learn all about the origins of scale models from Video Workbench.

2.title: Choosing A First Model Kit

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Before starting model kit building, you need to pick out the perfect model kit. But as a beginner hobbyist, there are several factors to consider before buying.

3.title: Tools & Supplies

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: A list of tools and supplies that can be useful for beginner and advanced model kit hobbyists alike.

4.title: Washing & Priming Model Kit Parts

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Washing and priming model kit parts is a key step before painting. In this video, learn how these techniques can save time and frustration down the line.

5.title: Essential Tips for Building Model Kits

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Discover how the small elements of model kit building are perhaps the most important and shouldn't be overlooked.

6.title: Sprue Tree Part Removal

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Removing parts from plastic model kit sprue trees can have adverse effects if not done properly. This video demonstrates two different techniques, including how to work with different plastics.

7.title: Repairing Parts & Blending Seams

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Despite all the organization and hard work, sometimes plastic model kit parts break or get lost. Learn the techniques to fix or replace them in this video.

8.title: D.I.Y. Diorama Materials

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Need special materials for your diorama but don't want them to look like they were bought from a store? Then these two diorama secrets will be very helpful.

9.title: Adding Detail to D.I.Y. Model Kits

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: There are several techniques that help bring impressive detail to model kits. In this video, make homemade rusty armor plating, scale canvas, tarps, and mud.

10.title: Crafting D.I.Y. Bricks, Walls & Turf

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Homemade scale model kit dioramas require little extras to bring out the fine details. In this video, discover techniques to enhance any type of diorama.

11.title: Basic Airbrush Tips & Advice

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: As a model enthusiast, there are factors to consider before purchasing an airbrush. In this comprehensive video, discover what you need to know before buying.

12.title: Maintaining & Cleaning an Airbrush

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Keeping an airbrush well-maintained is essential. From types of tools to use, to performing a quick or deep clean, this video has everything you need to know.

13.title: Airbrush & Compressor Reviews

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Reviews of the Sparmax HB-040 Airbrush and Iwata Power Jet 900 dual piston compressor.

14.title: Airbrush Ready Paints & Paint Stripper Reviews

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Reviews and demos of Gravity Colors Paints and AK Interactive Paint Stripper products.

15.title: Paint Layering Using an Airbrush

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: If you love painting models, then this video will be an eye-opener. Learn a few simple airbrush techniques for layering paints so that colors blend perfectly.

16.title: Masking & Airbrush Painting

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Continue painting using an airbrush, and learn how to use Silly Putty and cling wrap to mask detailed areas to protect the model kit from paint over-spray.

17.title: Using Metal Foil on Model Airplanes

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Sometimes all it takes for a scale plastic model kit to stand out is a bit of metal foil. In this video, learn this key airplane model technique.

18.title: Talking with Kevin Campbell - Part 1

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Jason Gares talks with former creator / owner of Video Workbench, Kevin Campbell. They discuss how Video Workbench was created, for what purpose, the video tech behind it and what model builders were involved.

19.title: Talking with Kevin Campbell - Part 2

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Jason and Kevin discuss more in depth about ideas in creating the video series, marketing the videos, the instructors, the instructors wives, Jill "The Face of Video Workbench" and much more.

20.title: Airplane Model Detailing Tips

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Creating scale model kit airplanes requires a unique set of tips, tricks, and techniques, several of which are introduced in this video.

21.title: Attack Squadron Resin Model Kit Reviews

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Jason Gares reviews 2 Attack Squadron resin model kits. What are his impressions? Watch the video to find out.

22.title: Jason Gares on Ep. 37 of the Plastic Scale Modeling Hour

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Jason Gares is a guest on The Plastic Scale Modeling Hour podcast. There he discusses his background with Video Workbench and the hobby of building and painting plastic scale model kits with host Gerald "Hawkeye" Voigt.

23.title: Starting a Resin Spaceship Model Kit

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Let your love of Sci-fi merge with a passion for model kits in this video, and start to build a resin model kit of the Icarus spacecraft as seen in the original "Planet of the Apes" movie.

24.title: Continuing to Build a Resin Spaceship Model Kit

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: In this second part of building the Icarus spacecraft from the original "Planet of the Apes" movie, Jason goes inside and works on building and painting the detailed cockpit.

25.title: Completing a Resin Spaceship Model Kit

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Finish the series with this in-depth video of tips, tricks, and techniques needed to build the resin model kit of the Icarus spacecraft from the original "Planet of the Apes" movie.

29.title: How to Cast Custom Model Parts

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

29.plot: Learn to craft a mold for a model and see why it's important to use gypsum-based Ultra Cal 30 as mother mold material. After this lesson, the mold will be done.

30.title: The Plastic Scale Modeling Hour Ep. 42 - FILLERS

episode of.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (TV Series 2015– )

30.plot: When you just can't get the fit perfect, its time to fill the imperfection. This week we chat with Jason Gares from Video Workbench about the various types of fillers used in scale modeling.

imdb.title: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show
akas: Video Workbench: the Scale Model Show (United States)
plot: Learn tips, tricks, and techniques that Video Workbench owner Jason Gares has learned over 30 years.::Jason Gares
